body_html: Hi Guys, I am also dealing with advanced indexing. I understand index select part and it works on single GPU I have the problem when it comes to multiple GPUs. Can you please have a look at https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/runtimeerror-index-select-with-dataparallel-arguments-are-located-on-different-gpus/10229

body: Hi Guys, I am also dealing with advanced indexing. I understand index select part and it works on single GPU I have the problem when it comes to multiple GPUs. Can you please have a look at https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/runtimeerror-index-select-with-dataparallel-arguments-are-located-on-different-gpus/10229
